searchInputPlaceHolder: Your Signum address or account name
noMiners: There are no miners, start inviting them!
nBlocksToShowMiner: Number of blocks to show a Miner
missingDetails: Missing details, contact your support operator
notBookmarkedMiner: You have not bookmarked a miner
configurationWithMessagesParagraph: If you have already joined the pool, you can further configure it by <1>sending unencrypted text messages</1> from your miner account to the pool account (effective after {{processLag}}):
shareModelParagraph: Change your share model to 80 % by sending the following text message (any number <1>from 0 up to 100 is accepted</1>)
donationPercentageParagraph: Change your donation percent to 5 % by sending the following text message (any number <1>from 0 up to 100 is accepted</1>)
minimumPayoutParagraph: Change your minimum payout to 100 SIGNA by sending the following text message (any number <1>higher than {{ minimumPayoutCount}} is accepted</1>):
changeMultipleOptionsParagraph: You can also configure multiple parameters with a single message, for instance:
minerOptionsAlert: If you will change miner settings, always send <1>unencrypted text messages</1>
startMiningTagDescription:
Join the sustainable
mining pool in a few steps.
startingMemberParagraphFLine:
Are you new to Signum mining?
Welcome to the community ❤️
Read this
startMiningFirstStepText: Before assigning the reward recipient, you must first set up a Signum wallet.
startMiningFirstStepSecondText: Meet the following wallets with which you can manage your Signa and also join the pool.
startMiningFirstStepThirdText: Reminder: Never, ever give your passphare to anyone!
startMiningSecondStepText: Now with your wallet, you must set the reward recipient to the following address:
startMiningSecondStepSecondText: Tip: It's recommended to use a local wallet
startMiningThirdStepText: After you assign the reward recipient successfully, you will need to wait for at least 4 block confirmations <1>(approximately 20 minutes)</1>.
startMiningFourthStepText: After the wait, you must configure your miner to use the following mining address:
notFoundPageFirstLine: Oops! we can't find that page
notFoundPageSecondLine: We could not find the page you were looking for.
